description.en: Led by the mighty king Aez and their beloved queen Aelide, the small Kingdom of Avalonia stands strong against any challenge. Avalonians never back down: the harder the battle gets, the stronger they become.
description.zh: 由強大的國王艾茲與他們心愛的女王艾莉德領導，阿瓦隆這個小王國在任何挑戰面前都保持堅強。阿瓦隆人從不退縮：戰鬥越艱難，他們便越強大。

Common Features.zh: 符文技能, 符文, 震懾, 防禦, +力量

description.en: The Kotoba banner rallies the strongest fighters of the Xzia Empire, an ancient reign built upon a single belief: Strength can conquer anything. Each Kotoba Hero devotes themselves fully to that belief.
description.zh: 言葉旗幟召集了西亞帝國最強的戰士，這是一個建立在單一信念上的古老政權：力量可以征服一切。每位言葉英雄都全身心投入這一信念。

Common Features.en: Strength Skills, Fireball, Dodge, Backstab, Shock
Common Features.zh: 力量技能, 火球, 閃避, 背刺, 震懾

description.en: The Sap Heart guild includes all heroes with a strong bond with nature and an iron will to protect the World Tree. They fight relentlessly, but are also gifted with incredible healing powers.
description.zh: 樹心公會包含了所有與大樹有著強大聯繫，並擁有保護世界樹的堅定意志的英雄。他們無畏地戰鬥，並且擁有強大的治癒能力。

Common Races.zh: 精靈族, 荷姆柴, 戴斯族

Common Features.en: Heal, Thorn, +/x Strength, Physical Attack, Rage
Common Features.zh: 治療, 荊棘, +/x 力量, 物理攻擊, 暴怒

description.en: Roaming across the seas of Guem, these swashbucklers are very dangerous because they act as though they have nothing to lose. They specialize in striking their opponents with thunder and powder blasts.
description.zh: 在格姆的海域上游蕩，這些海盜非常危險，因為他們的行為如同什麼都不在乎。他們專精於用雷霆和火藥攻擊敵人。

Common Races.zh: 人類, 格姆人, 野獸, 魔像

Common Features.zh: 閃電, 火藥, +力量, 雷擊

description.en: The Noz'Dingard Envoys are great experts in all kinds of magic. With the mighty strength of the Dragon Knights, the lethal dexterity of the Witchblades, and the arcane knowledge of the Compendium, Draconia stands stronger than ever.
description.zh: 諾茲丁加德使者是各種魔法的偉大專家。憑藉著龍騎士的強大力量、女巫劍刃的致命敏捷，還有《魔典》中的神秘知識，德拉科尼亞比以往更加強大。

Common Races.zh: 人類, 格姆人, 魔像

Common Features.en: Skills based on dice colour, +DMG, Fireball, Spellbreaker
Common Features.zh: 基於骰子顏色的技能, +傷害, 火球, 破魔

description.en: The Zil Warriors are the most wacky and erratic fellows you'll ever meet. Extremely aggressive and unpredictable, they will downright tear you to shreds or scare you to the bone.
description.zh: 齊爾戰士是你會遇到的最瘋狂、最不可預測的人。他們極具攻擊性且行為無常，會把你撕成碎片，或者把你嚇得魂飛魄散。

Common Races.zh: 人類, 野獸, 格姆人

Common Features.zh: 暴擊, 背刺, 恐懼, 模仿, 狂暴

description.en: The remote region of Tantad is home to the greatest army the lands of Guem has ever known: the Runic Legion. Strong, firm, and proud, the Legion's tactical prowess is unparalleled.
description.zh: 遙遠的坦塔德地區是格姆大陸上最強大的軍隊——符文軍團的故鄉。這支軍隊強大、堅定、自豪，並且在戰術上無人能敵。

Races.zh: 人類, 野獸, 格姆人

Common Features.zh: 符文技能, 符文, 震懾, 防禦, +力量

description.en: The Nomads inhabit the unforgiving southern lands of Guem, where the Desert dictates its own laws of survival. These harsh life conditions eventually turned the Nomads into magnificent fighters, blessed with their faith in multiple gods.
description.zh: 遊牧民族生活在格姆大陸的無情南方荒漠，這裡的沙漠擁有自己的生存法則。惡劣的生存條件最終讓遊牧民族成為了強大的戰士，並因信仰多神而獲得祝福。

Common Races.zh: 人類, 索拉利安, 死屍

Common Features.zh: 韌性, 祝福, 神蠍, 蝕, 斬擊

description.en: The depths of Guem host a terrible, hellish army, led by none other than the Dark Lord Nehant, sworn enemy of all life. These hellspawn specialize in burning down their opponents and rendering them unable to fight back.
description.zh: 格姆大陸的深淵中，存在著一支可怕的地獄軍隊，由黑暗領主尼漢領導，他是所有生命的死敵。這些地獄的後裔專門燒盡敵人，讓他們無法反抗。

Common Races.zh: 惡魔, 死屍, 格姆人

Common Features.zh: 火球, 反傷, 生命吸取, 狂暴

description.en: Mercenaries have no affiliation whatsoever with any existing guild. They have neither unique characteristics nor themes, but they host very powerful heroes that can be occasionally rallied by other guilds.
description.zh: 雇傭兵並不隸屬於任何現有的公會。他們沒有獨特的特徵或主題，但他們擁有非常強大的英雄，偶爾會被其他公會招募。

description.en: The Tempus are a restricted group of enigmatic spellweavers that control the flow of space and time. They are very strategic heroes that specialize in taking the reins of the match and turning the opponents' tactics against them.
description.zh: 時光法師是一群神秘的法師，他們掌控著空間與時間的流動。這些英雄非常具戰略性，擅長掌握比賽的主導權，並將對手的戰術反轉為己用。

description.en: The Winter Tribes thrive in the deep north, an unforgiving place where the rattling cold claims most lives. But some managed to survive and fully embrace the Icy essence of these lands, reaching new heights of power.
description.zh: 冬季部落生存於格姆大陸的極北地區，那裡的嚴寒環境使大多數生命無法生還。但有些人成功存活並完全融入這片冰冷大地的精髓，達到了新的力量巔峰。

Common Features.zh: 冰霜技能, 凍傷, 冰霜, 狂暴, +力量

description.en: The Stone Linkers are a complex guild composed of powerful Guemelites. It is led by Master Maen and Master-Linker Laelyse, who are also members of the Guild Council. For obscure reasons, they have long remained isolated from other guilds, but since the arrival of the Equinoxians in the lands of Guem, they advocate for alliances between guilds to defeat the enemy.
description.zh: 石之聯結者是一個由強大的格姆人組成的複雜公會。它由馬恩大師和聯結者萊莉絲大師領導，他們同時也是公會議會的成員。由於某些不明原因，他們長期與其他公會保持隔離，但自從春秋大陸的力量來到格姆大陸後，他們開始倡導公會間的聯盟，以共同對抗敵人。

Skill.name: Absorb
Skill.description:
Each of your opponents lose X of the specified alteration and you gain X of that alteration for each of them. 
You gain even if they didn't lose anything.

Skill.name: Aftermath
Skill.description:
Negative alteration.
At the start of the fight OR at the end of skill activation phase suffer X Flat DMG.
This alteration is consumed when triggered.
Flat DMG is a DMG that ignores everything.

Skill.name: Ageless Wisdom
Skill.description:
At the start of the fight, if you have at least:
2 Dice Rerolls lefting: you get 10 Dice Rerolls
4 Dice Rerolls lefting: deal 3 times as much Spellbreaker DMG as your opp Strength
8 Rerolls lefting: all your heroes receives 5 Stardust.
Spellbreaker damage is a normal damage that also removes half of a random positive alteration from your opponent.

Skill.name: Allergy Bouquet
Skill.description:
Passive.
Each time you activate an ability, the current TOTAL DMG you have been dealt is increased by 5%.
(The damage caused ignores any alteration)

Skill.name: Allure
Skill.description:
Negative Alteration.
The next X times you increase or obtain a positive alteration, half (rounded up) of this increase/new alteration is given to your opponent instead. (Only the increased part is considered if the card already has the alteration)
This skill currently has a bug that when the holder gets an alteration with value 1, it is consumed but happens nothing.

Skill.name: Alluring Skill
Skill.description: After the skill effect, applies to the opponent 1 Allure.

Skill.name: Almighty Frost
Skill.description:
Passive.
Each time your opponent receives a Frost token, you get 20 Might for each frost token received by them.
If you have more than 200 Might, you get 1 Critical instead.

Skill.name: Angry Totem
Skill.description:
Passive. Neutral Alteration.
Each time you gain Strength, your opponent's increase by 20% of it for each Angry Totem you have.
This effect cannot trigger another totem.

Skill.name: Arcane Barrier
Skill.description:
Positive Alteration. Shield-like.
Absorb the X next DMG you suffer (Normal and Shock DMG only).
During the combat, while you possess this alteration, every time you receive a negative alteration, you inflict a Shock 500 to your opponent, and every time you receive a positive alteration that isn't Arcane Barrier, you receive more 500 Arcane Barrier.
Increasing alterations triggers the side effect too.
Shock DMG is a DMG that cannot be altered by any alteration, but it cannot ignore shield-like skills.

Skill.name: Aura
Skill.description:
Neutral Alteration. Passive.
Increases the value of a specified alteration either by a given value or by a given percentage.

Skill.name: Azure Tsunami
Skill.description:
At start of the combat:
For each :blueDice: causes 1000 Pure DMG.
Increases all your positive alterations by 25% (rounded up).
Pure DMG is a DMG that ignores any alteration that could reduce or prevent it.

Skill.name: Backstab
Skill.description:
Deals X Normal DMG to your opponent.
Your opponent loses X/2 Strength.
Normal DMG is a DMG that can be altered by anything.

Skill.name: Barrage
Skill.description:
Deal X Normal DMG to your opponent.
Your opponent receives X/10 DMG-.
Repeat this skill effect for each Powder your opponent has. Consumes his powders.
Normal DMG is a DMG that can be altered by anything.

Skill.name: Berserk
Skill.description:
Positive alteration.
Each time you suffer a DMG that is not Flat DMG, increases your Strength by X.
Flat DMG is a DMG that ignores every alteration from you and your opponent.

Skill.name: Big Bang Requiem
Skill.description:
This Alteration's tick starts at 12, each time one of your opponent dice change, the tick goes down by 1 and your opponent receives 300 Echo.
When the tick goes down to 0: All opp dice are changed to :yellowDice: & deal 99 999 DMG.

Skill.name: Bite
Skill.description: Deal X normal damage and your opponent receive 100 Bleeding.

Skill.name: Bleeding
Skill.description:
When the bleeding hero takes damage, he immediately suffers an additional flat damage equal to his bleeding value.
If the damage is absorbed or is equal 0, Bleeding won't trigger.

Skill.name: Blessed Seeds
Skill.description: The next X times you activate an ability, you receive 200 Lightroot.

Skill.name: Blessing
Skill.description: Each time you deal DMG, you are healed by X.

Skill.name: Blizzard
Skill.description:
Positive alteration. Shield-like.
Absorb the X next DMG you suffer (Normal and Shock DMG only).
Each time Blizzard absorbs DMG, your opponent gets 1 Frost.

Skill.name: Bloodthirsty Thorns
Skill.description:
Passive.
Each time your heroes' Thorns deal damage, their opponent receives 10% of it's value as Bleeding.

Skill.name: Blue Gift
Skill.description:
Neutral Alteration.
After your opponent have dealt DMG to you and your DMG suffered is higher or equal to 5000 DMG, receive 800 Shield for each Blue Gift you have and consume all.
If you receive a gift after you already have 5000 suffered DMG, the gift is going to trigger in the next DMG you suffer.

Skill.name: Brain Freeze
Skill.description: The 2 heroes in combat lose all their positive alterations and all their :swordDice: become :redDice:.

Skill.name: Brave skill
Skill.description: The skill is amplified by half if your opponent is more wounded than you.

Skill.name: Bulwark
Skill.description: All the damage received above X is reduced to X.

Skill.name: Burgundy Gift
Skill.description:
Neutral Alteration.
At the start of the fight, your active allies receive 2 Stardust.

Skill.name: Burning Light
Skill.description: Every time your heroes are healed, they cause a DMG to their opponents equals 35% of the Heal.

Skill.name: Caress of Death
Skill.description:
Steal your opponent's positive alterations one by one. For each stolen alteration deal 1000 Life Drain DMG.
A Life Drain DMG is a Normal DMG that heals you by the same starting value.
The opposing positive are stolen BEFORE the Life Drains.

Skill.name: Chain Lightning
Skill.description: If the card suffers from the thunderstruck effect, it spreads it at 30% to its allies.

Skill.name: Chanelled Lightning
Skill.description:
Negative Alteration.
At the start of the fight, suffer X Lightning DMG and your allies receives X/2 Chanelled Lightning.
Lightning DMG is a normal DMG that applies 10% of its value as Thunderstruck to the opponent.

Skill.name: Charged Skill
Skill.description:
Increases the skill value by half consuming 1 Powder or 100 Thunderstruck on you.
(Powder has priority if you have both.)

Skill.name: Charts of Infinity
Skill.description:
Neutral Alteration.
The next times you activate a skill deal 2000 pure DMG and your opponent receives half of one of your negative alterations, and his allies receive 25% of it.
Pure DMG is a DMG that ignores all alterations that could reduce or prevent it.
You do not lose any part of your negative alterations.

Skill.name: Chromatic Symphony
Skill.description: At the start of combat, your opponent receives 500 Echo for each of your unique dice pairs (RR or BB or YY or SS).

Skill.name: Cleaver of Athorg
Skill.description:
Neutral Alteration.
Each time you activate a Skill, your opponent receive 2 Frost for each of your :swordDice:.
This alteration isn't consumable.

Skill.name: Cohesion
Skill.description: At the start of combat, the value of your skills is increased by 10% for each of the specified allies.

Skill.name: Confusion
Skill.description:
Negative Alteration. Consumable
When the holder of this debuff gets hit by a :swordDice:, the holder causes a :swordDice: DMG to himself too.
The Confusion DMG is a normal DMG that the card causes to itself considering all the alterations he has, i.e., consuming own Criticals, increased by DMG+, decreased by DMG-...

Skill.name: Constricting Skill
Skill.description: After the skill effect, applies to the opponent as much Constriction as half of the skill value.

Skill.name: Constriction
Skill.description:
Negative alteration.
Each time you activate a skill, suffer X DMG and all your negative alterations are increased by 10%.
This alteration self-increases too.

Skill.name: Corrupt
Skill.description: The skill is amplified by half for each negative alteration on your opponent.

Skill.name: Crackling Incantation
Skill.description:
Each time you are dealt DMG, you receive 3% of the total as DMG+ (flat increase if you already have DMG+).
A flat increase is the increase of an alteration that cannot interact with any other effect in the game.

Skill.name: Craft
Skill.description: Craft do something depending on the Swords you roll before the skill activation phase.

Skill.name: Crimson Death
Skill.description: Each time the opponent in combat receives Bleeding, the Strength of all your heroes will be increased by a quarter of the value. (This effect happens in all combats)

Skill.name: Critical
Skill.description: The next X times you deal DMG, the DMG is doubled.

Skill.name: Crush
Skill.description: Deal X DMG to your opponent (orX*1.5 of your Strength is superior to your opponents).

Skill.name: Crushing Skill
Skill.description: Increase the skill value by 50% if your Strength is higher than your opponent's Strength.

Skill.name: Curse
Skill.description:
Negative Alteration.
At the end of the skill phase, you suffer X flat DMG, repeated for every other negative alteration.
Flat DMG is a DMG that ignores everything.

Skill.name: Cursed Skill
Skill.description: After the skill, applies to the opponent 10% of the skill's value as Curse, +10% for each Eclipse on the opponent.

Skill.name: DMG Drain
Skill.description: Your opponents' DMG are decreased by X and all your DMG are increased by X.

Skill.name: DMG+
Skill.description: All your DMG is increased by X.

Skill.name: DMG-
Skill.description: DMG dealt by your character is reduced by X.

Skill.name: Dark Heritage
Skill.description: Every time your cards get an alteration that they didn’t have, their opponents receive 35 Terror.

Skill.name: Deadly Rain
Skill.description:
If Deathcaller Ludmilla is in play, at the start of the fight, deal as much Pure DMG as the Strength of Deathcaller Ludmilla to your opponent and your opponent receives 10% of the total as Bleeding, 3 times.

Deathcaller Ludmilla is always drawn at the beginning of the fight.

Pure DMG is a DMG that ignores all alterations that could reduce or prevent it.

Skill.name: Death Stare
Skill.description: Deal X DMG minus the Strength of your opponent that ignores all alterations that could reduce or prevent it.

Skill.name: Decisive Strikes
Skill.description:
Deal X Pure DMG.

Pure DMG is a DMG that ignores all alterations that could reduce or prevent it.

Skill.name: Decoy
Skill.description:
Positive Alteration

If one of your positive alterations should be targeted by one of your opponent's skills, it targets Decoy instead.

This alteration is triggered by Mimic, Mad Hat, Spellbreaker & Dispel.

This skill is not triggered by Tidal Wave, Swarm of Decay, Shieldbreaker, Brain Freeze or Caress of Death.

When triggered, only 1 Decoy is consumed, no matter the effect redirected.

Skill.name: Defend The Borders
Skill.description:
Once your opponent has been dealt 8000 DMG, all your active :ava: gain 2000 Shield and their Strength is increased by 200.

This quest can be triggered only 1 time per card.

Skill.name: Deja vu
Skill.description: Activate the last ability used by the opponent.

Skill.name: Devour
Skill.description:
Deal X normal DMG to the opponent.

If you have any negative alteration, consume one of them and receive X/2 STR.

Else, if you have a positive alteration, remove half of a random one and receive X STR.

Skill.name: Dexterity
Skill.description: The next X times you consume a Dodge, Riposte or Critical, gain one of the other 2 at random.

Skill.name: Dispel
Skill.description: Delete X positive alteration(s) on your opponent.

Skill.name: Dodge
Skill.description: The next X times you suffer DMG, it will be halved.

Skill.name: Draconic Legacy
Skill.description: Each time you obtain a DMG+, your allies gain 750 Blizzard.Each time you obtain a Shield type alteration (Shield / Blizzard / Arcane Barrier / Bulwark), your allies obtain 75 DMG+.This effect considers increasing Shield and DMG+ too

Skill.name: Dragon Bite
Skill.description: Deal X DMG and your opponent bleeds, it receives X/10 Bleeding.

Skill.name: Dragon Hide
Skill.description: The X next times you are dealt DMG, they will be halved and your opponent will be dealt half.

Skill.name: Dragon Noodles
Skill.description: Craftsman Passive.  The next X times your strength is reduced revert it and gain an additional 200 Strength.  At the end of the fight Heal 900 for each remaining Dragon Noodle.

Skill.name: Earthen Coating
Skill.description: Positive alteration. Shield-like Skill.  Absorbs the next X damage suffered.  As long as this is active, each time you activate a skill your opponent suffers X Earthquake damage.  Earthquake DMG is a DMG that ignores all alterations that could reduce or prevent it and applies half of its value as Aftermath to all active opponents.

Skill.name: Earthquake
Skill.description: Deal X Pure DMG to your opponent, and give to all the opposing heroes X/2 Aftermath.  Pure DMG is a DMG that ignores all alterations that could reduce or prevent it.

Skill.name: Eau de Corruption
Skill.description: After the skill activation phase, you receive a Strength value equal the sum of all malus your card have applied to the opponent during the combat.  Purify, Mist, Rain and Devour do not affect the STR gain.  Debuffs applied prior to the combat aren't counted on the STR gain.

Skill.name: Echoing Skill
Skill.description: Skill mddifier.  After the skill effect, applies Echo to your opponent equal to 10% of the skill's value.

Skill.name: Eclipse
Skill.description: Cancels the X next Heals of your opponent.

Skill.name: Electric Dragnet
Skill.description: Craftsman Passive.  The next X times you activate a skill, increase your opponent's negative alterations by 25% (rounded up).  If they do not have any, they receive Constriction 500.  After this deal 1500 flat damage and apply 150 Thunderstruck to them.

Skill.name: Empowered Skill
Skill.description: Increase the skill value by 10% for each level that your active equipment has.  This modifier rounds the value to the nearest integer.

Skill.name: Encore
Skill.description: Negative Alteration.  After the :swordDice: phase, reroll one of your dice to the same color.  This alteration triggers Echo, Dice Change based Equips & Song of the Abysses.

Skill.name: Endurance
Skill.description: The next X times you receive damage, the damage is reduced by the value of your Strength.

Skill.name: Eternal Fog
Skill.description: Each time one of your Mist is consumed, Heal 500.  At the end of skill activation phase, if you have at least:  3 Mist: You receive 4000 Shield and your allies receive 2 Mist.  7 Mist: Deal 2500 Shock DMG & your allies receive 2 Dodges.  18 Mist: Heals half of your current suffered DMG.

Skill.name: Eternal Winter
Skill.description: Every time your opponents trigger their Frostbite, the Frostbite is increased by 10%, and every time they deal a DMG from a Sword, their Frostbite is triggered again.

Skill.name: Fire Rune
Skill.description: Create X Rune and the DMG that your opponent deals is decreased byX*20. At the end of the opponent's skill activation phase, each Rune deals 200 DMG.

Skill.name: Fireball
Skill.description: Deals X DMG to your opponent and he has DMG -X/10.

Skill.name: Flare
Skill.description: Deal X Normal DMG and you receive one Solar Light.  Normal DMG is a DMG that can be affected by everything.

Skill.name: Flow
Skill.description: Every time you cast a skill, you Heal X.

Skill.name: Flowering
Skill.description: Deal X DMG and apply a Spore to you and your opponent.

Skill.name: Focus X -> Y
Skill.description: Gain as much Y as your X.  Your X is divided by 2.  Example: Focus Strength -> DMG+

Skill.name: Forked Lightning
Skill.description: Deal X Lightning DMG and your opponent's allies receives X/2 Chanelled Lightning.  Lightning DMG is a normal DMG that applies 10% of its value as Thunderstruck to the opponent.

Skill.name: Forsaken Destiny
Skill.description: Each time you activate a skill, you receive Curse equal to the sum of Curse on the opposing heroes.  At the end of skill activation phase, consume your Curse. If you have consumed at least:  2500 Curse: Deal 5000 flat damage. (not interacting with anything)  7500 Curse: Suffer 5000 flat damage to give ALL of your allies 2 Stardust. (even for non-active allies)  15000 Curse: All your opponent's receive 1500 Curse and 1500 more if you lose the round.

Skill.name: Freezing Criticals
Skill.description: Each time one of your heroes consumes a Critical, their opponent gets Frostbite 250. If they have already 750, trigger the Frostbite instead of giving more.

Skill.name: Frenzy
Skill.description: At the end of the skill activation phase, X random dice that aren't S become S.

Skill.name: Frost
Skill.description: ⋆ You are frosted, the Icy ability of your opponent will be increased by X tenth.

Skill.name: Frostbite
Skill.description: Your opponent will get 1 Frost and will be hurt by X each time he activates an ability.

Skill.name: Frostbolt
Skill.description: Deals X DMG to your opponent and he receives X/10 Frostbite.

Skill.name: Happy Totem
Skill.description: Passive. Neutral Alteration.  Each time you gain Strength, its value is increased by 20% for each Happy Totem you have.

Skill.name: Harsh Sickness
Skill.description: Neutral Alteration.  Each time your Strength should be lowered but is already at 0, you suffer as much flat DMG instead.  Flat DMG is a DMG that ignores everything.

Skill.name: Heal
Skill.description: Heals X DMG.

Skill.name: Heal The Villagers!
Skill.description: Quest Passive.  When you healed yourself at least 10 times, double your Strength and all your positive alterations.  This Quest is applied only to :ava: characters.

Skill.name: Hit
Skill.description: Deals X DMG.

Skill.name: Icy
Skill.description: The skill is amplified by a tenth for each Frost on your opponent. Your opponent gets 1 Frost.

Skill.name: Illusion
Skill.description: Activate an offensive ability at random with X as its value. (Except Smite and Physical Attack)

Skill.name: Impeding End
Skill.description: ⋆ Passive Skill. Neutral Alteration.  Everyone suffer at the start of the fight 8000 Pure DMG.  When the cards affected by Impeding End gets fully healed, deals 4000 Pure DMG to the opponent and deletes all opponent's positive alterations.  Pure DMG is a DMG that ignores all alterations that could reduce or prevent it.

Skill.name: Improvement
Skill.description: Passive.  Gives a new effect to already existing alterations.

Skill.name: Inspire
Skill.description: Your selected allies have 1 additional dice throw.

Skill.name: Invoke
Skill.description: If the specified Dragon is in your team, transform into a more powerful form.

Skill.name: Kiss of Oblivion
Skill.description: Both cards in combat heal any damage taken till the activation of this skill.

Skill.name: Leech
Skill.description: Negative Alteration  Each time you activate a skill, your opponent is healed by X, increased by the value of your Bleeding.

Skill.name: Lethal Dose
Skill.description: At the end of the skill activation phase, if your opponent has at least:  -10 Poison: Delete all his Positive alterations;  -15 Poison: his Strength becomes 0;  -25 Poison: He suffers 999 999 flat DMG.  Flat DMG is a DMG that ignores everything.

Skill.name: Life Drain
Skill.description: Deals X DMG to your opponent and you gain X health points.

Skill.name: Lightning
Skill.description: Strikes your opponent by dealing him X DMG and increasing by X/10 the next DMG he suffers.

Skill.name: Lightning Rune
Skill.description: Create X Rune and increase the next DMG that your opponent suffers byX*20. At the end of the skills activation phase, each Rune deals 200 DMG.

Skill.name: Lightroots
Skill.description: Each time your opponent deals DMG to you, your opponent will be hurt by X Shock DMG and you will be healed by X.  This alteration cannot be targeted by other skills or alterations.  Shock DMG is a DMG that cannot be increased and decreased, but still consumes skills as Scarab and Shield.

Skill.name: Mad Hat
Skill.description: ⋆ The next X times you activate a skill, copy an opposing positive alteration, then deal 1500 Shock damage to your opponent.

Skill.name: Madly-go-round
Skill.description: Each time you trigger a skill, your opponent's DMG+ are increased by your Terror malus value.  This effect is applied on the opponent at start of the fight.

Skill.name: Magma Wall
Skill.description: Each time your opponents deal DMG to you, they receive 6% of the total as DMG- (flat increase if your opponent already have DMG- ).  A flat increase is the increase of an alteration that cannot interact with any other effect in the game.

Skill.name: March of Conquest
Skill.description: At start of the combat, increase all the DMG your opponent will be dealt by an amount equal to your Strength (Maximum 500).

Skill.name: Mediate
Skill.description: ⋆ With 3 guilds being mediated, :cou: plus 2 other guilds, when any of the 3 guilds triggers the 1st effect, the current allies of the 2 other guilds receive the 2nd effect.  *Example: if it is Mediate :noz: & :win: opp Ice > DMG+ 25 , if a :win: card applies opp Ice the :noz: and :cou: receive DMG+ 25.

Skill.name: Meditation
Skill.description: ⋆ You heal X and half of a negative alteration on yourself is converted into Riposte or Dodge (if the value converted is 10 or lower) or +STR or +DMG (if higher than 10).

Skill.name: Menacing Sky
Skill.description: *Whenever your opponent receives Thunderstruck, you receive 50% of it as Berserk. Immediately when your opponent have been dealt:*  6000 Damage: Double your Strength.  12000 Damage: Receive 2 Critical, Dodge and Riposte.  24000 Damage: Deal 5000 Forked Lightning DMG to your opponent.  Forked Lightning DMG is a normal DMG that applies 10% of its value as Thunderstruck to the opponent and 50% of its value as Chanelled Lightning to your opponent's allies.

Skill.name: Mend
Skill.description: At the end of skills activation phase, you Heal X.

Skill.name: Might
Skill.description: Positive Alteration.  Each time you activate a skill, gain X Strength.

Skill.name: Mighty Skill
Skill.description: Skill Modifier.  After the skill effect, gain 10% of the skill's value as Might.

Skill.name: Mimic
Skill.description: Deal X DMG and copy a positive effect from the opponent (stackable).

Skill.name: Mirror
Skill.description: Position Alteration  The next X times your opponent receives a positive alteration, copy it (affected by decoy)  The next X times you receive a debuff your opponent copies it.

Skill.name: Mist
Skill.description: After you receive a negative alteration (increase counts too) during the combat, this negative alteration is halved.

Skill.name: Multiguild Skill
Skill.description: Increases the skill value by 25% per each different guild on your current cards in game.  The guild of your hero in combat is counted  The skill value is increased by at least 25% and at max by 75%

Skill.name: Necrotic
Skill.description: ⋆ The skill is amplified by half for each negative alteration on your current hero.

Skill.name: Nefertoth
Skill.description: Neutral Alteration.  At the end of the skill activation phase, for each of your Nefertoth, deal as much pure DMG as your Strength.  Pure DMG ignores every alteration from both in combat.

Skill.name: Noble
Skill.description: The skill is amplified by half if you are more wounded than your opponent.

Skill.name: Paper Scales
Skill.description: Each time you deal as much or less than 1000 DMG, you receive 15 Berserk.

Skill.name: Parry
Skill.description: The X next time you are dealt DMG, block them and deal as much DMG as your Strength.

Skill.name: Phalanx
Skill.description: ⋆ Positive alteration. Shield-like skill.  Absorbs the next X damage you suffer.  The damage dealt to Phalanx is decreased by the Strength of your allies.  Consumed before all the other Shield-type alterations (Shield, Blizzard, Arcane Barrier, Coating).  Shield Bash consume Shield first, then Phalanx on additional activation.

Skill.name: Physical Attack
Skill.description: Deal X times in a row as much DMG as your Strength.

Skill.name: Pillage
Skill.description: ⋆ Deal X Normal DMG and steal half of an opposing positive alteration.

Skill.name: Plague
Skill.description: Deal X Normal DMG and your opponent receive 1 Poison.

Skill.name: Poison
Skill.description: Negative Alteration.  The next time you would be healed, you suffer flat DMG instead.  At end of fight you suffer 500 flat DMG.  Flat DMG is a DMG that ignores everything.  This alteration trigger and causes the heal value as DMG even if your opponent is not damaged.

Skill.name: Portal
Skill.description: ⋆ Deal X DMG and apply one of the negative effects on your hero to your opponent (stackable).

Skill.name: Powder
Skill.description: ⋆ The X next time your suffer DMG from a S, a keg will explode and triple (before modification) these DMG.

Skill.name: Powerup Gaz
Skill.description: Each Time you activate a skill, if you have at least:  35 Stench: your opponent receive Harsh Sickness.  400 Stench: Gain as much Strength as your Stench Bonus.  1200 Stench: All your opponents (even the ones that still are in the deck) receive Harsh Sickness.

Skill.name: Purify
Skill.description: Delete X times half of a negative effect on your hero.

Skill.name: Quest
Skill.description: Each of your Avalonians have to complete a goal to share a buff between them.

Skill.name: Rage
Skill.description: Your Strength increases by X each time you deal DMG.

Skill.name: Rain
Skill.description: Heal X DMG and delete one of your negative alterations.

Skill.name: Rain of Arrows
Skill.description: The opposing heroes receive 20 Thunderstruck and you lose 10 Rage each time you consume a Critical.  When you will have consumed:  7 Criticals: Deal 2500 Shock damage and halve the Strength of the opposing hero.  11 Criticals: You and your allies receive 30 Vigor.  17 Criticals: At the end of skill activation phase activate your 1st and 2nd skills once.

Skill.name: Rain of Gifts
Skill.description: After the dice rolling phase, your cards obtain 1 Red Gift for each Red Dice rolled, 1 Blue Gift for each Blue Dice rolled, and 1 Yellow Gift for each Yellow Dice rolled.

Skill.name: Rampage
Skill.description: Deal X and you gain one Frenzy.

Skill.name: Red Gift
Skill.description: Neutral Alteration.  After you have dealt DMG to your opponent and his DMG suffered is higher or equal to 5000 DMG, deal 800 flat DMG for each Red Gift you have and consume all.  If you receive a gift after your opponent already have 5000 suffered DMG, the gift is going to trigger in the next DMG you cause.  Flat DMG is a DMG that ignores everything.

Skill.name: Redeeming Skill
Skill.description: After the skill effect, receive 1 Redemption.

Skill.name: Redemption
Skill.description: The next X times your Heal exceeds the DMG you have, increase your Strength and your positive alterations (except Redemption) by 25% (rounded up).  After the skill activation phase, you Heal 1000 per each Redemption lefting.  The end phase's Heal effect can trigger another Redemption too.

Skill.name: Reflected Skill
Skill.description: If the reflected skill is a positive alteration, your allies also receive 25% of it for each Reflection in the game.  If the reflected skill is a negative alteration, your opponent's allies also receive 25% of it for each Reflection in the game.  (The opponent's Reflections are considered too, so can have at max 6 Reflection in game, ranging from 25% to 150% of reflected alteration.)

Skill.name: Resilience
Skill.description: All the DMG you suffer decreases by X.

Skill.name: Resonant Echo
Skill.description: Whenever your opponent's Echo is triggered, you receives 20% of it as DMG+ and your opponent receives 20% of it as DMG-.  If you have at least 400 DMG+, trigger Purify 1 Instead.

Skill.name: Restore
Skill.description: At end of the skill activation phase you Heal X. This effect is repeated for each other positive alteration you have.  Restore doesn't count itself in the repetition.

Skill.name: Riposte
Skill.description: The X next times you suffer DMG from a S you'll deal as much DMG as your Strength.

Skill.name: Round of Drinks
Skill.description: The next X times you receive a positive alteration, your allies receive 50% as well and you deal 2000 Shock DMG to your opponent.  Shock DMG is an unmodifiable DMG.

Skill.name: Rune
Skill.description: Create X Runes. At the end of the Skills activation phase, each Rune deals 200 DMG.

Skill.name: Runic
Skill.description: The skill is amplified by half for each of your Rune. Your Runes are destroyed.

Skill.name: Sacred
Skill.description: Increases the skill value by half for each positive alteration on you.

Skill.name: Scarab
Skill.description: The next X times you receive DMG, this DMG will be converted into Heal.

Skill.name: Seek the Thunder's Spear!
Skill.description: Passive. Each time you change a dice into :swordDice:, strike your opponent with a Lightning 1000.  (Change 2 or more dices of same color at same time counts as 1 trigger only)

Skill.name: Seismic Tremor
Skill.description: Passive.  Each time you activate a skill, deal flat damage to your opponent equal to your Strength.  Flat damage is a damage that ignores everything.

Skill.name: Shield
Skill.description: ⋆ Absorb the X next DMG you suffer.

Skill.name: Shield Bash
Skill.description: You lose your Shield and deal one and a half its value plus X DMG.

Skill.name: Shieldbreaker
Skill.description: Breaks one of the opposing shield alterations (Shield, Blizzard or Arcane Barrier) removing it. Then you cause X DMG, plus the value of shield removed more half.

Skill.name: Shock
Skill.description: Deals X unmodifiable DMG.

Skill.name: Silver Gift
Skill.description: Neutral Alteration. Consumable.  The next times you activate a skill your Strength and your positive alterations are increased by 20% (rounded down).

Skill.name: Sinister
Skill.description: The skill value is increased by 50% for each opposing positive alteration.

Skill.name: Smite
Skill.description: Deal as much DMG as your opponent!s Strength multiplied by X.

Skill.name: Smuggled
Skill.description: The skill value is doubled if your opponent has the same skill (don't need to be the same value).

Skill.name: Smuggler's Treaty
Skill.description: Passive.  Each time your :pir: receive any positive alteration, your :zil: on the field receive 25% of it (rounded up).  Each time your :zil: receive any positive alteration, your :pir: on the field receive 25% of it (rounded up).  (This effect can be triggered only during the combat, so alterations obtained out of combat won't be shared)

Skill.name: Solar Light
Skill.description: Positive Alteration.  If you are :solarian: : The next time you Heal DMG, heal the same amount another time.  If you are not :solarian: : the next time you suffer DMG, you suffer the same amount another time as a flat DMG.  Flat DMG is a DMG that ignores everything.

Skill.name: Song of the Abysses
Skill.description: Each time one of your dice changes, you are hurt by 750 Shock DMG, and one of your current opponent's positive alteration is increased by 25% (rounded up)  Shock DMG is a DMG that cannot be reduced or increased, but still is affected by Scarab and Shield-like skills.  This effect is applied on the opponent's team.

Skill.name: Spellbreaker
Skill.description: ⋆ Deal [VALUE] DMG, delete half of a positive alteration on your opponent.

Skill.name: Spoils of War
Skill.description: Each time one of your cards wins a battle, its current allies receive as much Strength as the defeated's base Strength, plus 1 Frenzy and 1 Endurance.

Skill.name: Spore
Skill.description: Apply a Spore, at each skill activation it grows. At the end of the skill activation phase deal 400 DMG for each of your Spores or Heal 400 DMG for each of your Spores if you are Dais.

Skill.name: Stardust
Skill.description: Positive Alteration  The next X times you receive a positive alteration, its value is increased by half (only the received value). (Rounded up)

Skill.name: Static Charge
Skill.description: ⋆ Every time the Shield of your cards absorbs DMG, who damaged it suffers a pure DMG equal half of the absortion and receives 10% of the absortion as Thunderstruck.

Skill.name: Stench
Skill.description: You stink, your opponent loses X Strength each time you activate an ability.

Skill.name: Stone
Skill.description: ⋆ Posivite Alteration  At the end of the skill activation phase, you receive 500 Shield.  This alteration is used by the Ultimate Armor Skill to trigger some effects.

Skill.name: Storm
Skill.description: The elements are unleashed, deal X DMG to your opponent and increase all the next DMG they take by X/10 each time you activate an ability.

Skill.name: Strength Drain
Skill.description: Your opponent's Strength is reduced by X and your Strength increases by X.

Skill.name: Strength+
Skill.description: Your Strength increases by X.

Skill.name: Strength-
Skill.description: Your opponent loses X Strength.

Skill.name: Support
Skill.description: Give to all heros of the specified attribute the specified alteration.

Skill.name: Swarm of Decay
Skill.description: Halves all positive alterations received during the combat.

Skill.name: Symbiosis
Skill.description: Cards with Symbiosis share 50% of all buffs received between them.

Skill.name: Talonstrike
Skill.description: The next X times you deal DMG via a Sword Dice you deal a pure DMG equal this DMG dealt.

Skill.name: Terror
Skill.description: The DMG that your opponent's hero deals is reduced by X each time he activates an ability.(stackable)

Skill.name: The Axiom of Strength
Skill.description: Triples your Strength, then deals a Shock Damage equal to the Strength Bonus accumulated by your heroes during the game.

Skill.name: Thorn
Skill.description: Your opponent will be hurt by X each time he deals DMG to you.

Skill.name: Thorny Spore
Skill.description: Each time you activate a skill, consume a Spore to gain 150 Thorns.

Skill.name: Thunder of Guem
Skill.description: Each time you receive DMG+, your opponent will receive a Thunderstruck equal half of its value multiplied by the Swords you rolled before the Skill Activation Phase.

Skill.name: Thunderclap
Skill.description: Deal X Lightning DMG.  Each time you attack with a :swordDice:, the opposing heroes receive Thunderstruck equal to 10% of your Strength.

Skill.name: Thunderstruck
Skill.description: ⋆ All the DMG you suffer increase by X.

Skill.name: Tidal Wave
Skill.description: Increase the value of one of your positive alterations by 25% (rounded up) and deal X DMG.

Skill.name: Time Loop
Skill.description: Activates again the skill that activated as number X in the skill sequence. This sequence counts skills from both in combat, and it counts any skill cast, so if the 2 first skills casts were your 1st ability, Time Loop 2 will replay it..

Skill.name: Transcendence
Skill.description: ⋆ Give to all your heros of the specified attribute: while throwing the dices, you can't get S.

Skill.name: Twinkle Little Star
Skill.description: At the start of the fight, you receive 1 Stardust for each of your unique Dice Pair.  Dice Pair is a combo of 2 equal dices, like:redDice: :redDice: .

Skill.name: Ultimate Armor
Skill.description: Everytime your shield absorbs DMG without getting destroyed, you receive one Stone. At the end of the skill activation phase, If you have at least:  -5 Stones: Your Strength become 1500 and delete all your negative alterations;  -10 Stones: you receive 3 Frenzy;  -19 Stones: you become Unbreakable.  Unbreakable means that you cannot receive any DMG anymore.

Skill.name: Unified Skill
Skill.description: Increases the skill value by 25% per each different race on your current cards in game.  The race of your hero in combat is counted  The skill value is increased by at least 25% and at max by 75%

Skill.name: Verdant Growth
Skill.description: Each time you heal yourself or receive thorns, your Strength increases by 20% of the value.

Skill.name: Vigor
Skill.description: Positive Alteration.  Every time you damage the opponent, you get X DMG+.  If you already have the DMG+ alteration, Vigor does a 'flat' increase, not interacting with others effects.

Skill.name: War Runes
Skill.description: Neutral Alteration. Consumable.  The next times you activate a skill, you receive 2 Runes, or 300 DMG+ if you already have Runes.

Skill.name: Wildfire
Skill.description: Each time you cast a skill, you inflict X Fireball to the opponent.

Skill.name: Yellow Gift
Skill.description: Neutral Alteration.  At the end of skill activation phase, Heal 800 per each Yellow Gift.
